info.title: NetworkSecurityPerimeter
info.description: The Network Security Perimeter API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with network security perimeter resource.

get.description: Gets the specified network security perimeter by the name.

200.description: Request is successful. Returns the resulting network security perimeter resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a Network Security Perimeter.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameter supplied to create or update the network security perimeter.

200.description: Resource Updated. Returns the network security perimeter.

201.description: Resource Created. Returns the network security perimeter.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Delete Succeed.

204.description: Request successful. The resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all network security perimeters in a subscription.

200.description: Request is successful. Returns the list of the network security perimeters.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List network security perimeters in a resource group.

200.description: Request is successful. Returns a list of network security perimeters.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the NSP profile.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a network profile.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that hold the NspProfile resource to be created/updated.

200.description: Update - Profile is immutable resource. Returns the existing profile resource.

201.description: Create - Returns the NspProfile resource created.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Delete Succeed.

204.description: Request successful. The resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the NSP profiles in the specified network security perimeter.

200.description: OK - Returns the list of NSP profiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified NSP access rule by name.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the NSP access rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a network access rule.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that hold the NspAccessRule resource to be created/updated.

200.description: Updated - Existing access rule is updated. Returns the resource.

201.description: Create - Returns the NspAccessRule resource created.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Delete Succeed.

204.description: Request successful. The resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the NSP access rules in the specified NSP profile.

200.description: OK - Returns the list of NSP access rules.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified NSP association by name.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the NSP resource association.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a NSP resource association.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that hold the NspAssociation resource to be created/updated.

200.description: Updated - Existing resource association is updated. Returns the resource.

201.description: Create - Returns the NspAssociation resource created.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Delete Succeed.

204.description: Request successful. The resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: OK - Returns the list of NSP resource associations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified NSP association by name.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the NSP resource association.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a NSP resource association.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that hold the NspAssociation resource to be created/updated.

200.description: Updated - Existing resource association is updated. Returns the resource.

201.description: Create - Returns the NspAssociation resource created.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Delete Succeed.

204.description: Request successful. The resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: OK - Returns the list of NSP resource associations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the list of resources that are onboarded with NSP. These resources can be associated with a network security perimeter

200.description: Request successful. Returns the list of resources that are onboarded with network security perimeter feature.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Action to check members associated to an NSP Profile

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameter supplied to create the network security perimeter check members.

200.description: Check members, nothing is getting created or updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Action to query network security parameter

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameter supplied to query network security parameter.

200.description: Query NSP using parameter guid, no resource created or updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for NSP access rule reconcile

200.description: Reconcile NSP access rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

location.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next page of results.

NetworkSecurityPerimeterListResult.description: Result of the request to list NetworkSecurityPerimeter. It contains a list of network security perimeters and a URL link to get the next set of results.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the scope assignment resource.

perimeterGuid.description: perimeter guid of the network security perimeter.

properties.description: Properties of the network security perimeter profile

name.description: The name of the profile resource that is unique within a perimeter. This name can be used to access the resource.

id.description: Identifier of the network security perimeter profile in ARM id format.

NspProfile.description: The network security perimeter profile resource

value.description: Gets a page of NSP profile

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next page of results.

NspProfileListResult.description: Result of the request to list NSP profiles. Contains a list of NSP profiles and a URL link to get the next set of results.

accessRulesVersion.description: Version number that increases with every update to access rules within the profile.

properties.description: Properties of the NSP access rule.

name.description: The name of the access rule that is unique within a profile. This name can be used to access the resource.

value.description: Gets a page of NSP access rule

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next page of results.

NspAccessRuleListResult.description: Result of the request to list NSP access rules. Contains a list of NSP access rules and a URL link to get the next set of results.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the scope assignment resource.

direction.description: Direction that specifies whether the access rules is inbound/outbound.

fullyQualifiedDomainNames.description: Outbound rules fully qualified domain name format.

subscriptions.description: Subscription id in the ARM id format.

networkSecurityPerimeters.description: Inbound rule specified by the perimeter id.

id.description: NSP id in the ARM id format.

perimeterGuid.description: Resource guid of the NSP supplied.

properties.description: Properties of the NSP resource association.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

value.description: Gets a page of NSP resource associations

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next page of results.

NspAssociationsListResult.description: Result of the request to list NSP resource associations. Contains a list of NSP resource associations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource  association resource.

privateLinkResource.description: The PaaS resource to be associated.

profile.description: Profile id to which the PaaS resource is associated.

hasProvisioningIssues.description: Specifies if there are provisioning issues

properties.description: Properties of the perimeter associable resource.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

id.description: Identifier of the perimeter associable resource.

PerimeterAssociableResource.description: Resource that is onboarded to use network security perimeter. Also referred as perimeter associable resource.

value.description: Gets paged list of perimeter associable resources.

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next page of results.

PerimeterAssociableResourcesListResult.description: Paged list of perimeter associable resources.

displayName.description: A friendly name for the properties of perimeter associable resources.

publicDnsZones.description: Public DNS zone names of the resources.

PerimeterAssociableResourceProperties.description: Properties of the perimeter associable resources.

CheckMembers.description: Request object for check members API.

isMember.description: yes/no, if it is member or not.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

NetworkSecurityPerimeterNameParameter.name: networkSecurityPerimeterName
NetworkSecurityPerimeterNameParameter.description: The name of the network security perimeter.

ProfileNameParameter.name: profileName
ProfileNameParameter.description: The name of the NSP profile.

AccessRuleNameParameter.name: accessRuleName
AccessRuleNameParameter.description: The name of the NSP access rule.

AssociationNameParameter.name: associationName
AssociationNameParameter.description: The name of the NSP association.

ListTopParameter.name: $top
ListTopParameter.description: An optional query parameter which specifies the maximum number of records to be returned by the server.

ListSkipTokenParameter.name: $skipToken
ListSkipTokenParameter.description: SkipToken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skipToken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

NetworkSecurityPerimeterProfileParameter.name: networkSecurityPerimeterProfile
NetworkSecurityPerimeterProfileParameter.description: The name of the network security perimeter profile.

LocationParameter.name: location
LocationParameter.description: The location of network security perimeter.
